short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows Chrome extension developers to visualise statistics of their other chrome extensions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Developers are now able to visualise their Analytics with a simple click!

Just download the 'Installs' files from your Developer Dashboard, and then upload it to the corresponding page on this extension. The data will then be compiled into graphs for easy analysis.
